text: @piersmorgan @mikegalsworthy Or maybe start explaining what is happening with #COVID19, what data tells us, future plans etc instead of treating public like idiots with press conferences where we're told eleventy trillions items of PPE have been delivered & shoplifting has fallen now most shops are shut?
